name: Mind Devourer
description:

Increases unit upkeep by 20 Mana.

name: Havoc Caster

name: Fleshsculptor
description:
Possession becomes Greater Possession.Fleshweave becomes Fleshsculpt.



Increases unit upkeep by 20 Mana.

name: Puppeteer
description:
Possession becomes Puppeteer's Possession.Eldritch Mind Control becomes Puppeteer's Domination.



Increases unit upkeep by 20 Mana.

description: Causes a unit to explode when killed, dealing 20 <damageSpirit></damageSpirit> <hyperlink>Spirit Damage</hyperlink> to adjacent enemy units.

Effects are increased for non-repeating attacks.
